email_subject: BUSINESS ALERT: Phillips, Conoco to Merge
email_body: BUSINESS ALERT from The Wall Street Journal Sunday, Nov. 18, 2001 Phillips Petroleum and Conoco agreed to merge, the energy companies announced Sunday afternoon.
